5- Mention other EV companies in the industry and whether they trend similar or different compared to Ather and Ola
6- Mention key risks or upsides to revenue for Ather and Ola going ahead
7- Include appropriate commentary from equity research reports on any of the above points

Market analysis for EV industry:
1- Gather current market size of EV 2-wheelers in India including volume (units sold per month/year for last 2 reporting periods) and value (total market size in INR crore and USD bn) and calculate effective per-unit price by dividing total market size in USD by total units sold
2- Summarize how the market has evolved in the last 2–3 years and highlight key milestones or events that shaped the market
3- Collect information on overall investments into the segment from private players and government subsidies (e.g., FAME II)
4- Find market projections for the next 3–4 years including CAGR percentage split into volume and value
5- Identify growth drivers such as improvement in EV technology, improving relations with China for rare earth access, continued government support through schemes like FAME II, government agenda on green vehicles and ESG perspective, and continued capex investments by players with high capex intensity
6- Highlight challenges to achieving this growth including range anxiety, lack of charging infrastructure, high upfront cost with explanation of duties associated with EVs, supply chain issues, and lack of indigenous battery technology (mention Ola’s development efforts)
7- List the top 5 players in the EV market in terms of volume and size
8- Provide a brief history of each EV market player in two lines
9- Show their market share and how it has moved historically in the last two years and explain reasons for changes such as why Ola is down 60% YoY
10- Create a comparison table for the top 4–5 players including total revenue, total sales in units, per unit price, EBITDA margin, and current market value
11- Summarize strategic initiatives of each player in the EV market, in one to two lines describing what they are doing to improve their market position
